Option: msg:"FILE-IDENTIFY DIB file download request"; flow:to_server,established; http_uri; content:".dib",fast_pattern,nocase; pcre:"/\x2edib([\?\x5c\x2f]|$)/smi"; flowbits:set,file.bmp; flowbits:noalert; metadata:policy balanced-ips alert,policy max-detect-ips alert,policy security-ips alert,ruleset community; service:http; reference:url,en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMP_file_format; classtype:misc-activity; sid:20963; rev:16;
